con:config.script:
import java.io.File import jxl.* import groovy.json.JsonSlurper //read excelfile Workbook wb = Workbook.getWorkbook(new File('C:/Users/AbhishekMishra/Desktop/Datasheet.xls')) sheet = wb.getSheet(1) row = sheet.getRows() for(i=1;i<row;i++) { Username =sheet.getCell(0,i).getContents() FirstName =sheet.getCell(1,i).getContents() LastName =sheet.getCell(2,i).getContents() Email =sheet.getCell(3,i).getContents() Password =sheet.getCell(4,i).getContents() Phone = sheet.getCell(5,i).getContents() UserStatus = sheet.getCell(6,i).getContents()
testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create_User").setPropertyValue("username",Username) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create_User").setPropertyValue("firstName",FirstName) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create_User").setPropertyValue("lastName",LastName) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create_User").setPropertyValue("email",Email) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create_User").setPropertyValue("password",Password) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create_User").setPropertyValue("phone",Phone) testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create_User").setPropertyValue("phone",UserStatus)
testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.testSuites["Assignment_SOAPUI"].testCases["TestCase 2_SOAPUI"].testSteps["Post_CreateUser"].run(testRunner,context)
def responsebody = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Post_CreateUser").getPropertyValue("response") slurperResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responsebody) String id = slurperResponse.message testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create_User").setPropertyValue("id",id) log.info id
log.info "Update User" Updateusername=sheet.getCell(7,i).getContents()
testRunner.testCase.getTestStepByName("Create_User").setPropertyValue("updatedusername",Updateusername) testRunner.testCase.testSuite.project.testSuites["Assignment_SOAPUI"].testCases["TestCase 2_SOAPUI"].testSteps["Put_UpdateUser"].run(testRunner,context) def responsebody1 = context.testCase.getTestStepByName("Put_UpdateUser").getPropertyValue("response") slurperResponse = new JsonSlurper().parseText(responsebody1) log.info responsebody1
}

con:eventHandlers.name: RequestFilter.filterRequest
TestRunListener.afterStep
